articles.author: Hayley Halpin
articles.title: Almost two thirds of people in Ireland are in favour of Ukraine joining the EU, poll shows - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: That’s according to the latest annual European Movement Ireland ‘Ireland and the EU’ poll.
articles.content:
ALMOST TWO THIRDS of people in Ireland are in favour of Ukraine joining the European Union, new polling shows. 
The latest annual European Movement Ireland Ireland and the EU poll, conducted by Red … [+4565 chars]

articles.author: Hayley Halpin
articles.title: Irish judge Síofra O'Leary elected president of the European Court of Human Rights - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: She has worked as a judge at the ECtHR since July 2015.
articles.content:
Updated Mon 10:23 PM
AN IRISH JUDGE has been elected as the new president of the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR).
53-year-old Síofra OLeary will be the first woman to hold the position.
She… [+3207 chars]
